mapper.select: SELECT USR.ID, USR.[USER_ID], USR.FULL_NAME, USR.ENC_PASSWORD AS PASSWORD, USR.USER_SECTION, USR.EMAIL, USR.EXT_NO, USR.USER_ROLE, USR.CREATED_BY, USR.CREATED_DT, USR.MODIFIED_BY, USR.MODIFIED_DT, ROLE.ACCESSIBLE_SCREEN AS AUTHORITIES FROM TB_M_USER USR INNER JOIN TB_M_ROLE ROLE ON USR.USER_ROLE=ROLE.ID WHERE USR.USER_ID = #{userId}
